hero.title: Neverr

hero.description: Reshape your subconscious through "self-voice affirmation" to make change feel natural. It's not about "quitting" bad habits, but becoming someone who "never does those things."

philosophy.title: The Key to Change is Psychological Cognition
philosophy.subtitle: Neverr is based on cognitive psychology principles, redefining your identity through positive self-declarations
philosophy.wrongDesc: This expression implies you're essentially a smoker who's just trying to "quit"
philosophy.rightDesc: This expression redefines your identity - you're essentially someone who doesn't smoke
philosophy.cardDesc: When you repeatedly say "I never..." statements in your own voice:
cardPoints: Your brain gradually accepts this new identity
Your subconscious automatically rejects related negative behaviors
Change becomes more natural and lasting

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Neverr ("we", "our", or "us") handles your information when you use our mobile application (the "Service").

noDataCollection.title: No Data Collection
noDataCollection.content: Neverr is designed with privacy as a fundamental principle. We do not collect, store, or process any personal data from our users. The app operates entirely offline and does not require an internet connection.

localStorage.title: Local Data Storage
localStorage.content: All your data, including your habit goals, voice recordings, and progress statistics, are stored exclusively on your device. This data never leaves your device and is not transmitted to our servers or any third-party services.

noInternetRequired.title: No Internet Required
noInternetRequired.content: Neverr functions completely offline. The app does not connect to the internet, send analytics, or communicate with external servers. Your privacy is guaranteed by design.

dataTypes.title: Types of Data Stored Locally
dataTypes.content: The following types of data are stored only on your device:
items: Habit goals and affirmation statements you create
Voice recordings of your personal affirmations
No personal identifiers or account information

dataControl.title: Your Data Control
dataControl.content: Since all data is stored locally on your device, you have complete control over your information. You can delete the app at any time to remove all associated data from your device.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Neverr does not integrate with any third-party services, analytics platforms, or advertising networks. No data is shared with external parties.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Your data remains on your device for as long as you keep the app installed. We do not have access to your data and cannot retrieve or delete it remotely.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at: [contact information will be provided upon app release]
